<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Create a shared token filter</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"post"} path={"/v1/shared-tokens/filters"}></MethodEndpoint>



Creates a new shared token filter.

**Note:** This endpoint requires permissions that must be set by our Support team. Please email [help@logz.io](mailto:help@logz.io) for assistance. <br /> 
*Please ensure to change the region in the URL to match your account's region.*

## Request
